nodes.name: Schedule Trigger
nodes.notes: Runs daily at 10:00 AM. Change cron expression as needed.

nodes.name: Read Category URLs
nodes.notes: Replace YOUR_SPREADSHEET_ID with your actual Google Sheets ID

nodes.name: Prepare Category URL
nodes.notes: Extracts URL from sheet. Optionally reads 'max pages' column.

nodes.name: Start Scraping Job
nodes.notes: Sends POST request to API. Returns job_id immediately.

nodes.name: Wait 1 Minute
nodes.notes: Initial wait. Category scraping takes 2-10 minutes depending on pages.

nodes.name: Route By Status
nodes.notes: Output 1: Success ‚Üí Output 2: Failed ‚Üí Output 3: Retry

nodes.name: Format for Sheets
nodes.notes: Converts API results to Google Sheets format with formulas

nodes.name: Write to CATALOG
nodes.notes: Appends wine data to CATALOG sheet. USER_ENTERED keeps formulas.

nodes.name: Log Error
nodes.notes: Handles failed jobs. You can add email notification here.

nodes.name: Wait 90 Seconds
nodes.notes: Wait before retry. Category scraping can take 5-10 minutes.

nodes.name: Retry Counter
nodes.notes: Prevents infinite retry loop. Max 5 retries = ~10 min total.
